p: The supernatant of the medium containing pseudoparticles were concentrated at 40,000 rpm for 25 min in a Hitachi centrifuge (Hitachi, Japan). Subsequently, both the original and concentrated supernatants were negative stained, and the pseudoparticles were observed using transmission electron microscopy (TECNAI 12, FEI, Blackwood, NJ) with an acceleration voltage of 80 kV.
